mapper.insert: insert into t_shop (shop_name, shop_logo, shop_url, shop_info, sort, remark, coupons_use, status) values (#{shopName},#{shopLogo},#{shopUrl},#{shopInfo},#{sort},#{remark},#{couponsUse},1)
mapper.select: select id, shop_name, shop_logo, shop_url, shop_info, sort, remark, coupons_use, status from t_shop where id=#{id}

select count(1) from t_shop where 1=1
and shop_name like '%${shopName}%'

select id, shop_name, shop_logo, shop_url, shop_info, sort, remark, coupons_use, status from t_shop where 1=1
and shop_name like '%${shopName}%'
and status = #{status}
order by sort asc
